Text: NGPL Eddy CoPlease notify John Franks of the Artesia team if you need to flow gas at NGPL Eddy Co

Abo FlowThe Empire Abo volume now flows through the Agave Loco Loop however when Agave has compressor problems the flow will come back to us When the Abo operator calls for their volume each morning be sure to check for accumed flow at both locations

RE TWNNG ImbalanceSounds good to me Original Message From Schoolcraft Darrell Sent Monday January PM To Spraggins Gary DLETS Gas Controllers Subject RE TWNNG Imbalance As of the th TW and NNG are balanced I agree with Gary we need to stay balanced ds Original Message From Spraggins Gary Sent Monday January PM To DLETS Gas Controllers Subject TWNNG Imbalance Looks like we made up gas NNG owed TW the last few days so lets stayed balanced on a daily basis Gary

FW PNM Rio Puerco Cc Johnnie Nelson repaired our flow direction controls today Original Message From Ellington Michael Sent Monday November PM To DLETS Gas Controllers Subject PNM Rio Puerco Had some problems getting this interconnect on rate today Steve Richards went out and got the flow contol valves to where they will operate however we cannot change flow direction from Gas Control If the direction needs to be changed someone will have to go out and do the valve changing manually Thanks Mike E
